# core.functions.log { #optyx.core.functions.log }

```python
core.functions.log(x)
```

Natural logarithm.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                                     | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value (must be positive). | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                     |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing log(x). |
